typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	fileSystem: 'bronze',
	folderPath: 'VanArsdel',
	fileName: 'dbo_Actors.parquet') ~> Actors
Actors derive(DataSourceId = 2) ~> AddDataSourceId
AddDataSourceId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'silver',
	folderPath: 'Actors',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ActorId = ActorID,
		Name = ActorName,
		DataSourceId
	)) ~> ActorsSink
